name: CYBERGAME 2077
description:
Cybergame 2077 is a Fast Paced Action Game Made For the LOWREZJAM 2022.  You Play as a Spaceship Destroying Aliens who have invaded the Earth.

Made by Arnar.

Music Made by Emidex.

https://soundcloud.com/user-581582519-972479866

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rules:

Dont Shoot and you will heal.

Shoot to gain points.

Try to beat my score. Its 1329

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Left mouse button = Shoot.

Right mouse button = Boost.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sources:

https://ansimuz.itch.io/cyberpunk-street-environment

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Future of Cybergame 2077:

I doubt I'll continue working on the current iteration of the game. However, I'm considering redesigning it in Unity and turning it into a mobile game with far more polish and content. I'll try to create the best game I can if I have any spare time.

--------------------
